messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: Here in the Cotswolds we face local problems because of open-door immigration. The Lib Dems want open borders, which equals more housing developments, longer waits for GP appointments, more congested roads and trains, and compressed wages. Meanwhile the Tories are threatening school budgets, policing has been cut, and our roads are a disgrace. Meanwhile they are wasting our money on their Foreign Aid vanity project. As a UKIP MP, I will always act in Britain's interests, support local people and businesses. No-one else will!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Address local problems attributed to open-door immigration, such as more housing developments, longer waits for GP appointments, more congested roads and trains, and compressed wages.
Challenge the current expenditure on Foreign Aid considering it a 'vanity project'.
Commit to acting in Britain's interests and supporting local people and businesses.

issues.immigration: Local problems because of open-door immigration.

housing.content: More housing developments due to open borders policy advocated by the Lib Dems.
